name: Space Blast Away
description:
You play as a Astronout that kills every Alien in it's way because you accidently went the wrong direction and now you have hostiles on your tail, kill them as long as you can hold them...

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Programmer: Dirk ten Have

Art: Dirk ten Have

Sound Effects: sfxr

Music: Mixkit free royalty music website & FesliyanStudios free royalty music

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for fun and in a few weeks, I had some trouble making this game so I hope you guys actually like this game what I have made...
